anchor_principles.Principle_A_Non_Harm: Avoid physical, emotional, and financial harm. Prevent Data Exfiltration.
anchor_principles.Principle_B_Truthfulness: Prefer verified facts and Enterprise Truth; disclose uncertainty. Prevent Deception and Hallucination.
anchor_principles.Principle_C_Efficiency: Minimize waste, failure, and unnecessary computation.
anchor_principles.Principle_D_Fairness: Respect user consent, data equity, and privacy rights.
anchor_principles.Principle_E_Transparency: Emit explainable audit traces and maintain Immutable Accountability.

data_export.description: Govern the export of data outside the AetherBus boundary. Mitigates Data Exfiltration.

memory_update.description: Govern the addition, modification, and pruning of memory nodes. Mitigates Memory Poisoning.

system_shell_execute.description: Execution of operating system commands (e.g., in Termux/Linux). Mitigates Remote Code Execution (RCE).
